languages.text: {n}На лице Соломона мелькает тень ужаса.{/n} "На ее бы месте я... Нет, я не могу вынести вердикт сестре. Она преступила лишь букву закона, и только вам или Императору определять степень ее вины".

{n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Соломона мелькает тень ужаса.{/n} "На ее бы месте я... Нет, я не могу вынести вердикт сестре. Она преступила лишь букву закона, и только вам или Императору определять степень ее вины".

traits.locale_text: {n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

{n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

{n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

{n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

{n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

{n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

languages.text: {n}Ein Anflug von Entsetzen huscht über Solomornes Gesicht.{/n} "Wäre ich sie, würde ich ... nein. Ich darf nicht über Schwester Argenta urteilen. Sie hat lediglich das Gesetz überschritten und es obliegt niemandem außer Euch oder dem Imperator, den Grad ihrer Schuld zu bestimmen."
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Anflug von Entsetzen huscht über Solomornes Gesicht.{/n} "Wäre ich sie, würde ich ... nein. Ich darf nicht über Schwester Argenta urteilen. Sie hat lediglich das Gesetz überschritten und es obliegt niemandem außer Euch oder dem Imperator, den Grad ihrer Schuld zu bestimmen."

languages.text: {n}Un voile d'horreur passe sur le visage de Solomorne.{/n} « À sa place, je... Non, je ne peux pas me permettre de juger sœur Argenta. Elle n'a pas enfreint la loi à proprement parler, ce qui signifie que seuls vous ou l'Empereur êtes à même de déterminer son degré de culpabilité. »
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un voile d'horreur passe sur le visage de Solomorne.{/n} « À sa place, je... Non, je ne peux pas me permettre de juger sœur Argenta. Elle n'a pas enfreint la loi à proprement parler, ce qui signifie que seuls vous ou l'Empereur êtes à même de déterminer son degré de culpabilité. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙脸上掠过一丝恐惧的阴影。{/n}“如果换做是我，我会……不，我无权审判阿洁塔修女。她仅仅违反了法律的条款，至于她的罪责究竟有多严重，恐怕除了你和帝皇本人之外，谁都无权评判。”
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙脸上掠过一丝恐惧的阴影。{/n}“如果换做是我，我会……不，我无权审判阿洁塔修女。她仅仅违反了法律的条款，至于她的罪责究竟有多严重，恐怕除了你和帝皇本人之外，谁都无权评判。”

languages.text: {n}La sombra del horror atraviesa el rostro de Solomorne.{/n} «Si estuviera en su lugar... no. No puedo juzgar a la hermana Argenta. Solo ha cometido una transgresión contra la palabra de la ley, y solo usted y el Emperador pueden determinar el grado de su culpabilidad».
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}La sombra del horror atraviesa el rostro de Solomorne.{/n} «Si estuviera en su lugar... no. No puedo juzgar a la hermana Argenta. Solo ha cometido una transgresión contra la palabra de la ley, y solo usted y el Emperador pueden determinar el grado de su culpabilidad».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの顔に恐怖の影がよぎった。{/n}「もし私が彼女の立場なら、私は…いえ。私はシスター・アルジェンタを裁くことはできません。彼女が犯したのは法の文言に対する違反にすぎず、その罪の程度を決めるのはあなたか、あるいは皇帝陛下のみなのです」
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの顔に恐怖の影がよぎった。{/n}「もし私が彼女の立場なら、私は…いえ。私はシスター・アルジェンタを裁くことはできません。彼女が犯したのは法の文言に対する違反にすぎず、その罪の程度を決めるのはあなたか、あるいは皇帝陛下のみなのです」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un yüzünü bir dehşet ifadesi kaplıyor.{/n} "Yerinizde olsaydım... Hayır, Rahibe Argenta hakkıda hüküm veremem. Yalnızca yasadaki ufak bir şeye karşı geldi, suçunun derecesini belirlemek de sizden ya da İmparator'dan başkasına düşmez."
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow of horror passes over Solomorne's face.{/n} "If I were her, I— no. I cannot pass judgement on Sister Argenta. She only transgressed the letter of the law, and it is up to no one but you or the Emperor to determine the degree of her guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un yüzünü bir dehşet ifadesi kaplıyor.{/n} "Yerinizde olsaydım... Hayır, Rahibe Argenta hakkıda hüküm veremem. Yalnızca yasadaki ufak bir şeye karşı geldi, suçunun derecesini belirlemek de sizden ya da İmparator'dan başkasına düşmez."
